model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker B: About that Bluegrass show -- A friend of mine mentioned that he has a cabin he won't be using only about 20 minutes away. Do you and your wife want to stay there so you can make it? Might be a more comfortable way for your wife to camp. Let me know. 

MEMORY:
User Description:
Speaker A is a music-loving individual who enjoys playing all styles of music at home. They have a Subaru that is currently making a funny noise. Speaker A also mentioned the need for money and Mexican food for a baby. They are a nightclubber who frequents live band venues and loves interacting with women. Their car has been running smoothly, and they try to attend live events weekly. Speaker A plays the guitar daily but hasn't had much time for it recently.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a friendly and helpful relationship. Speaker B, who is a mechanic, offered to look at Speaker A's Subaru to fix the issue. Speaker B also mentioned needing money for the baby on the way and shared concerns about his wife's pregnancy. They plan to attend a local festival together and enjoy bluegrass music.

Event Description:
Events shared between Speaker A and Speaker B include planning to attend a bluegrass band concert, discussing the expenses of having a new baby, and preparing for the upcoming festival. Speaker B will take time off when the baby is born and is excited about the food and drinks at festivals. They are supportive of each other's interests and willing to help out whenever needed.
current_dialogue: Speaker B: About that Bluegrass show -- A friend of mine mentioned that he has a cabin he won't be using only about 20 minutes away. Do you and your wife want to stay there so you can make it? Might be a more comfortable way for your wife to camp. Let me know.

raw_prediction: Speaker A: Yeah, I'm really looking forward to the festival. I haven't been to one in a while, so it should be a great time. And I could definitely use some good music and relaxation after dealing with my car trouble. Thanks again for offering to take a look at it. Hopefully, it's nothing too serious.
prediction:
Brief explanation: The MEMORY contains relevant information such as the planning to attend a bluegrass concert and the dynamic between Speaker A and Speaker B, which offers background on their relationship and intentions regarding the event discussed in the DIALOGUE CONTEXT. Hence, it can aid in generating an appropriate response regarding the stay at the cabin for the bluegrass show.
Judgement: "Yes"
